---
title: "Location"
format: html
---
```{r}
install.packages("ggthemes")

```


```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)

```

```{r}
dating_app_data <- read.csv('../data/dating_app_behavior_dataset.csv')
```

How does location (i.e. remote area, metro, etc) impact app dependence? 
```{r}
ggplot(dating_app_data, aes(fill=location_type,x=app_usage_time_min)) +
         geom_density(alpha = 0.5)

dating_app_data |>
  group_by(location_type) |>
  mutate(location_mean_usage = mean(app_usage_time_min)) |>
ggplot(aes(x=location_type, y=location_mean_usage)) +
  geom_col()
```
```{r}
ggplot(dating_app_data, aes(x = app_usage_time_min, fill = location_type)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  labs(
    title = "Distribution of App Usage Time by Location Type",
    x = "App Usage Time (minutes)",
    y = "Density",
    fill = "Location Type"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
```{r}
dating_app_data |>
  group_by(location_type) |>
  summarize(location_mean_usage = mean(app_usage_time_min, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = location_type, y = location_mean_usage, fill = location_type)) +
  geom_col(width = 0.6) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  labs(
    title = "Average App Usage Time by Location Type",
    x = "Location Type",
    y = "Average Usage Time (minutes)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none")

```

How does location type influence the number of matches or successful interactions users report?

```{r}
colnames(dating_app_data)
```

```{r}
dating_app_data |>
  group_by(location_type) |>
  summarize(avg_mutual_matches = mean(mutual_matches, na.rm = TRUE))

```

```{r}
ggplot(dating_app_data, aes(x = location_type, y = mutual_matches)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(title = "Mutual Matches by Location Type",
       x = "Location Type",
       y = "Number of Mutual Matches")
```
```{r}
ggplot(dating_app_data, aes(x = location_type, y = mutual_matches, fill = location_type)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.7) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Set2") +
  labs(title = "Mutual Matches by Location Type",
       x = "Location Type",
       y = "Number of Mutual Matches") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        plot.title = element_text(face = "bold", size = 14),
        axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
        axis.title = element_text(size = 12))

```
